channel.title: How do I change the name of my server so that I can advertise it?
channel.description: The name says Ownage PK, but when I try to advertise it on Server Status it says the server is offline, but I am logged on to it, plz help.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 08:30:13 AM[/size][hr]plz help!![br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 08:35:14 AM[/size][hr]omg plz help!!!!

if you already port forwarded download the DUC…

item.title: How do I change the name of my server so that I can advertise it?
item.dc:creator: @iceburster iceburster
item.description:
@iceburster wrote:

What’s DUC?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 09:00:06 AM[/size][hr]I guess I’ll just try to port-forward again and see how it works.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 09:01:48 AM[/size][hr]Umm, the port for my server is 666, which port do I change? the Externet port or the Internet port to 666?
[center] Do not double post. Read the Rules[/center]
